Post.title: Hexo  RSS
Post._content:
##### hexo-generator-feed 

###### npm
`npm install hexo-generator-feed -d`
###### yarn
`yarn add hexo-generator-feed`

##### _config.[themes].yml

###### 
```yml
    RSS: /atom.xml || fa fa-rss
```

###### 

```yml
    feed:
        type: atom  # atom
        path: atom.xml # 
        limit: 20 # 

```
##### 

`hexo clean && hexo generate`

##### 

![atom.xml](https://pic.imgdb.cn/item/6533d473c458853aefb79c42.png)

##### hexo-generator-feed 

###### npm
`npm install hexo-generator-feed -d`
###### yarn
`yarn add hexo-generator-feed`

##### _config.[themes].yml

###### 
```yml
    RSS: /atom.xml || fa fa-rss
```

###### 

```yml
    feed:
        type: atom  # atom
        path: atom.xml # 
        limit: 20 # 

```
##### 

`hexo clean && hexo generate`

##### 

![atom.xml](https://pic.imgdb.cn/item/6533d473c458853aefb79c42.png)

npm

_config.[themes].yml

hexo clean && hexo generate

Post.title: session-cookies  localStoragesessionStorageCookies
Post.description: session-cookies This plugin is used to summarize the browsers three caches localStorage, sessionStorage, Cookies.The plugin is designed to be quick and easy to use. Below is a summary of some apis.
Post._content: # session-cookies session-cookies is localStoragesessionStorageCookies session-cookies This plugin is used to summarize the browser's three caches localStorage, sessionStorage, Cookies.The plugin is designed to be quick and easy to use. Below is a summary of some apis. session-cookies localStoragesessionStorageCookiesAPI #### API | | | | | | | | :-----: | :------------------: | :---------------: | :---------------: | :------------------: | :-----------------: | | cookies | getCookieList | getCookie | setCookie | removeCookie | clearCookie | | session | getAllSessionStorage | getSessionStorage | setSessionStorage | removeSessionStorage | clearSessionStorage | | local | getAllLocalStorage | getLocalStorage | setLocalStorage | removeLocalStorage | clearLocalStorage | #### ```shell npm i session-cookies ``` ##### Cookies ```ts import { cookies } from 'session-cookies' cookies.getCookieList(); // JSON cookies.getCookie('test'); // ``` ##### ```ts cookies.setCookie('test', '1234567'); // JSON.stringify ``` ##### ```tsx cookies.removeCookie('test'); ``` ##### ```tsx cookies.clearCookie(); ``` #### API | indexkey | | | | ----------------------------- | --------- | ------- | | getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex | index | key | | getSessionStorageKeyFindIndex | index | key | ##### ```ts import { local } from 'session-cookies'; local.setLocalStorage('test', '123456'); local.setLocalStorage('usename', 'songshao'); local.getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex(0); // test local.getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex(1); // username ``` ### Browsers ```html ```
Post.raw: --- title: session-cookies localStoragesessionStorageCookies permalink: /browser/session/cookies.html date: 2023-10-22 18:06:18 description: session-cookies This plugin is used to summarize the browsers three caches localStorage, sessionStorage, Cookies.The plugin is designed to be quick and easy to use. Below is a summary of some apis. tag: [, , cookies, localStorage, sessionStorage, TypeScript] comments: true categories: - - Cache --- # session-cookies session-cookies is localStoragesessionStorageCookies session-cookies This plugin is used to summarize the browser's three caches localStorage, sessionStorage, Cookies.The plugin is designed to be quick and easy to use. Below is a summary of some apis. session-cookies localStoragesessionStorageCookiesAPI #### API | | | | | | | | :-----: | :------------------: | :---------------: | :---------------: | :------------------: | :-----------------: | | cookies | getCookieList | getCookie | setCookie | removeCookie | clearCookie | | session | getAllSessionStorage | getSessionStorage | setSessionStorage | removeSessionStorage | clearSessionStorage | | local | getAllLocalStorage | getLocalStorage | setLocalStorage | removeLocalStorage | clearLocalStorage | #### ```shell npm i session-cookies ``` ##### Cookies ```ts import { cookies } from 'session-cookies' cookies.getCookieList(); // JSON cookies.getCookie('test'); // ``` ##### ```ts cookies.setCookie('test', '1234567'); // JSON.stringify ``` ##### ```tsx cookies.removeCookie('test'); ``` ##### ```tsx cookies.clearCookie(); ``` #### API | indexkey | | | | ----------------------------- | --------- | ------- | | getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex | index | key | | getSessionStorageKeyFindIndex | index | key | ##### ```ts import { local } from 'session-cookies'; local.setLocalStorage('test', '123456'); local.setLocalStorage('usename', 'songshao'); local.getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex(0); // test local.getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex(1); // username ``` ### Browsers ```html ```
Post.content:
session-cookies

session-cookies is localStoragesessionStorageCookies

session-cookies This plugin is used to summarize the browsers three caches localStorage, sessionStorage, Cookies.The plugin is designed to be quick and easy to use. Below is a summary of some apis.

session-cookies localStoragesessionStorageCookiesAPI

API
cookies getCookieList getCookie setCookie removeCookie clearCookie
session getAllSessionStorage getSessionStorage setSessionStorage removeSessionStorage clearSessionStorage
local getAllLocalStorage getLocalStorage setLocalStorage removeLocalStorage clearLocalStorage

Cookies

API

indexkey
getLocalStorageKeyFindIndex index key
getSessionStorageKeyFindIndex index key

Browsers

Post.title: type
Post._content:
#### type 

 :    (  )

##### 1. 

** :** `type  = `

** :**

```typescript
  type St = string // 

  let str1:St = 'abc'
  let str2:string = 'abc'

```

##### 2.

** :** `type  =  | 1 | 2`

** :**

```typescript
  type NewType = string | number // 

  let a: NewType = 1
  let b: NewType = '1'

```

##### 3.

**** `type <T> = <T> | 1<T> | 2<T>`

**** :

```typescript
	type NewType<T> = {
    name: T
  }
  let a : NewType<number> = { name: 0 }
  let b : NewType<string> = { name: '0' }
```



##### 4.()

****`type  =  & 1 & 2`

****

```typescript
  type User = {
      name: string;
      age?: number;
  }

  type Job = {
      jobs: string;
  }

  type UserInfo = User & Job;

```

##### 1. 

** :** `type  = `

** :**

```typescript
  type St = string // 

  let str1:St = 'abc'
  let str2:string = 'abc'

```

##### 2.

** :** `type  =  | 1 | 2`

** :**

```typescript
  type NewType = string | number // 

  let a: NewType = 1
  let b: NewType = '1'

```

##### 3.

**** `type <T> = <T> | 1<T> | 2<T>`

**** :

```typescript
	type NewType<T> = {
    name: T
  }
  let a : NewType<number> = { name: 0 }
  let b : NewType<string> = { name: '0' }
```



##### 4.()

****`type  =  & 1 & 2`

****

```typescript
  type User = {
      name: string;
      age?: number;
  }

  type Job = {
      jobs: string;
  }

  type UserInfo = User & Job;

```
